official-title.#text:
To amend the securities laws to require that registration
		  statements, quarterly and annual reports, and proxy solicitations of public
		  companies include a disclosure to shareholders of any expenditure made by that
		  company in support of or in opposition to any candidate for Federal, State, or
		  local public office.
